Salt_Lake_City.Eborn Books:
Eborn Books is a bookstore (selling new, used, and rare books) and book publisher located on the Wasatch Front with its main store in Salt Lake City, Utah, United States.


== Description ==
The company specializes primarily in the Mormon book market and sells a majority of its more than half-million books on a consignment plan. It also publishes non-fiction works within the Mormon literature genre.
